SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractGamePhase
An abstract base class for game phases in the Seas of Yore game.
AIPlayer
 
BattlePhase
Represents the battle phase of the Seas of Yore game.
Board
Represents the game board in the Seas of Yore game, managing players, their quadrants, and game-play phases.
BoardPanel
Represents the main game board panel, managing the display of friendly and enemy QuadrantPanels, as well as background animations and layout.
CellPanel
Represents an individual cell in the game board grid.
Civilization
Organizational enumeration I chose to use, because of historical themes.
CustomButton
Custom button class, configured for icons.
Direction
Represents the cardinal directions (NORTH, EAST, SOUTH, WEST) used in the game.
DraggableShip
Represents a ship that can be dragged and placed on the game board during the ship placement phase.
FallingStoneAnimation
Small class that uses event threads to guide the animation of small stones that fall from the top of the screen.
GameController
Controls the flow of the Seas of Yore game, managing phases, UI interactions, and game state.
GamePhase
Represents a phase in the Seas of Yore game.
Player
Represents a player in the Seas of Yore game, managing their fleet, civilization, and game quadrants.
PlayerQuadrant
Represents the player's quadrant in the Seas of Yore game.
QuadrantListener
Lightweight event-forwarding class for use with CellPanel and dragLayerPanel GameController
QuadrantPanel
Represents a player's quadrant in the game, with layered rendering for ship sprite & other effects.
SalvoBattlePhase
Represents the Salvo battle phase in the Seas of Yore game.
SeasOfYore
Main entry point of the program.
Ship
Represents a ship in the Seas of Yore game.
ShipHeading
Represents the heading (position and direction) of a ship on the game board.
ShipPlacementPhase
Represents the ship placement phase in the Seas of Yore game.
ShipType
Represents the different types of ships available in the Seas of Yore game.
SidebarPanel
Represents the sidebar panel in the Seas of Yore game.
TerminalPanel
 
WinScreenPanel
Just a simple, admittedly crappy win screen overlay.
